article.title: Migrating to using a distributed channel index
article.description: Migrating an existing Sync Gateway deployment to using a distributed channel index

introduction.note: These instructions are for migrating an existing Sync Gateway deployment to use a distributed channel index. For instructions about creating a new Sync Gateway deployment that will use distributed channel indexing, see Migration.

Mixed channel-indexing approaches are not possible. All Sync Gateway instances in a Couchbase Mobile deployment must use either channel caches or a distributed channel indexing. For a Sync Gateway cluster using channel caches, migration to using a distributed channel indexing must happen at the same time for all databases. After you migrate a deployment, you cannot migrate back. Migration must be done in a specific manner that requires simultaneous downtime of all Sync Gateway instances.
